Sorry it took so long to reply, Prodigy's been out of order yesterday.

Looking around the room Phobia catches a flash reflection in one of the
vievscreens. He tried to move but Deaths slash. He moved quick enough to
avoid decapitation but not quite fast enough to avoid the blow. The slash
caught the side of his head slashing it open. "You descendant of a mechan
dog, what are you doing?" he screamed as he turned to face hisassailant. He
tried to fire his eye beams but the slash caused a malfunction. His face
sparked as the malfunction took control. He collapsed in pain. he would have
been screaming if the sparks hadn't knocked out his vocals too.
----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 14, 2000 1:42 PM
Subject: Death takes Phobia


>   Death glided across the hall. He had been trained by the best assains
back
> on cybertron. He was almost impossible to hear. He also had the ability to
> tap into a bot data tracks. He waled past the bridge and noticed Phobia.
He
> scanned his tracks and found horrible things. He decided to kill the bug.
He
> glided across the bridge floor. He stood behind Phobia..(remember he is
very
> very diff to hear.) He pulled his reaper and proceeded to cut off the bots
> head......
>
